abstract: Prosecutors will not appeal Superior Court's dismissal of some criminal charges against former Penn State officials implicated in Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said they would not appeal a ruling that threw out some criminal charges against three former Penn State administrators related to their handling of the Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal.

headline.main: Dismissals in Penn State Case Stand

snippet: Prosecutors said they would not appeal a ruling that threw out some criminal charges against three former Penn State administrators related to their handling of the Jerry Sandusky child molestation scandal.
